overview: The Kumbh is more than a spiritual gathering. It is a confluence of tradition, technology & teamwork. A congregation of faith, hope and consciousness. It's the most unique experience on this planet. Watch 'Kumbh: Among The Seekers'.  HistoryTV18 will present a one-hour special about the worldâ€™s most spectacular human gathering, the Kumbh Mela. The incredible festival is widely known to be the largest peaceful gathering on the planet.
title: Kumbh: Among the Seekers
